title: 5th Blog Anniversary
content:
Pencil Sketch of a Pumpkin by Nehal (my 8 year old son)

This month I celebrate five years of blogging. I was on an unplanned blogging break, thanks to erratic internet connection. Two weeks ago, on 8th November, Sailu's Kitchen passed its 5th anniversary. I cannot believe that I have been blogging for 5 years. :)

I want to say 'Thank You' to all my dear readers for all these memorable five years. I hope you will keep visiting my humble blog and leave your valuable comments. Your support and encouragement is deeply appreciated.
